text: Erginus galkini is a species of sea snail, a true limpet, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Lottiidae, one of the families of true limpets. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Chernyshev A.V. & Chernova T.V. 2002. Erginus galkini sp. nov. (Gastropoda, Lottiidae), a new species of limpets from the North Pacific Ocean. [In Russian]. Ruthenica 12(2): 107-112 ==External links== * Category:Lottiidae Category:Gastropods described in 2002
title: Erginus galkini
